item.description:
On October 18th, 2012, The Dedham Rotary Club will again host Taste Dedham. The fundraiser will raise money for many of the services and programs that the Dedham Rotary Club support; i.e. College Scholarships to two Dedham residents, Dedham Youth Sports, Dedham police, fire & veteran causes, Dedham seniors, enrichment programs for low income children and families in Dedham, The Dedham Food Pantry, other community needs and International Charities: Habitat for Humanity.

Taste Dedham will feature samplings from 27 restaurants, raffle, live auction, music, and much more. Tickets for this event are $30 per person, $35 at the door. The event is a chance to showcase the outstanding culinary offerings of Dedham.

Tickets can be purchased at Blue Hills Bank (749 Providence Highway, Dedham Plaza) Dedham Savings Bank (55 Elm Street, Dedham) & Needham Bank (402 Washington Street, Dedham), also on-line at http://www.dedhamrotary.com/

Participating Restaurants: Aquitaine Dedham, Blue On Highland, Brickhouse Café, Buca di Beppo Italian Restaurant, Chiara Bistro, Corrib Pub & Restaurant, Cristelle’s Restaurant, Deli After Dark, Diana’s Fine Catering, Genki Ya Japanese Cuisine, Halfway Café, Isabella’s Restaurant, J.P. Lick’s, Kings Dedham, Olivadi Restaurant & Bar, P.F Chang’s China Bistro, Qdoba Mexican Grill, Regina’s Bakery, Roche Bros Supermarkets Catering, Salem Food Market, Santoro’s Sicilian Trattoria, Studio 3 Restaurant & Bar, Summer Shack, Texas Barbeque Express, Vincenzo’s Italian Specialty Store & Deli, Whole Foods Market Dedham and Yard House.

Guests will be able to enjoy:

* Complimentary Swag Bags donated by the Diamond Sponsors filled with restaurant & business products

* Sample tasty servings from 27 restaurants

* Entered to win two door prizes courtesy of Costco Wholesale

* Try their luck at The Taste Dedham Raffles

* Bid on fabulous "Experience" Live Auction Packages:

- Man's Cave
- Night Out in the City
- Kids Play
item.name: Taste Dedham 2012
